testcase.name: invalidate_nullKey_throwsIllegalArgumentException()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Redis does not allow for null keys. So we want to check for null keys and throw an IllegalArgumentException. ==> Unexpected exception type thrown, expected: <java.lang.IllegalArgumentException> but was: <java.lang.NullPointerException>
